attributes.background: The British public has voted to leave the EU and Tony Blair is using his position to incite civil disobedience.

rejection.details:
We can't accept a petition calling for impeachment because this procedure is now considered obsolete. It is not therefore clear what action could be taken on this petition. 
 
This note explains the history of impeachment and the current position: 

http://researchbriefings.parliament.uk/ResearchBriefing/Summary/CBP-7612
